title: Vege Creek - Song Gao Rd
description: Another one of Vege Creek stores in the area; this one is at 台北市信義區松高路16號 inside the Breeze Shopping Centre. Choose your own fresh vegetables, tofu, faux meat, and noodles then the staff will be make it into a one-pot wonder in minutes. Customers dine at one large table. Nearest MRT is Taipei City Hall, take Exit 2, walk past the W Hotel towards Taipei 101, turn left into Song Gao Rd (at the Citibank), and there are two Breeze malls separated by a walkway, and it's in the furtherest one if coming from the MRT station. It's also a short walk from Taipei 101.
